channel.title: Welcome to my page! on Saitejas Mopuri
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to my page! on Saitejas Mopuri

item.title: Twitter disaster detector
item.description: github url webapp Twitter_real_or_not How to detect disasters using twitter tweets? Table of contents Define Problem How to detect disasters using twitter tweets? Discover Data Exploratory Data Analysis(EDA) Data Visualization Develop solutions Establish a baseline NLP Models LSTM Glove LSTM Bert Deploy solution Automate the pipeline Deploy the solution to gcloud and firebase Defining The Problem How can we identify the disasters through tweets?

item.title: Tensorflow Developer
item.description: certificate What skills are coverd in this exam? Build and train neural network models using TensorFlow 2.x Build, compile and train machinelearning(ML) models using TensorFlow. Preprocess data to get it ready for use in a model. Use models to predict results. Use pre trained models (transfer learning) Build sequential models with multiplelayers. Build and train models for binaryclassification. Build and train models for multi-classcategorization Identify strategies to prevent overfitting, including augmentation and dropout Image classification

item.title: Cloud Practicioner
item.description: Digital badge What is this certification? The AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner examination is intended for individuals who have the knowledge and skills necessary to effectively demonstrate an overall understanding of the AWS Cloud, independent of specific technical roles addressed by other AWS Certifications Abilities Validated by the Certification Define what the AWS Cloud is and the basic global infrastructure Describe basic AWS Cloud architectural principles

item.title: Coursera Tensorflow in practice
item.description: certificate What is this course? In this hands-on, four-course Professional Certificate program, I have learned the necessary tools to build scalable AI-powered applications with TensorFlow TensorFlow is one of the most in-demand and popular open-source deep learning frameworks available today. The DeepLearning.AI TensorFlow Developer Professional Certificate program has taught me how to apply machine learning skills with TensorFlow so I can build and train powerful models

item.title: Devanagari language recognizer
item.description: github url webapp Devanagari Recognizer Objective: To accuratley classify the Devanagari Characters Table of contents Define Problem Can we accuratley classify the Devanagari Characters? Discover Data Data Visualization Develop solutions Machine Learning Models Hyperparameter tuning Deploy solution Flask and Heroku Defining the problem What is Devanagari language? The Nāgarī or Devanāgarī alphabet developed from eastern variants of the Gupta script called Nāgarī, which first emerged during the 8th century.

item.title: Loan Predictions
item.description: github url lendingCompany Objective: Can we predict trustworthiness? Table of contents Define Problem Can we predict the right loan applicant from their background? Goals Discover Data Exploratory Data Analysis(EDA) Data Visualization Develop solutions Establish a baseline Machine Learning Models Hyperparameter Tuning & Optimization Best model Defining The Problem Can we predict the right loan applicant from their background?

item.title: Machine Learning Boot Camp
item.description: What did I learn through this course? Programming with Python NumPy with Python Using pandas Data Frames to solve complex tasks Use pandas to handle Excel Files Web scraping with python Connect Python to SQL Use matplotlib and seaborn for data visualizations Use plotly for interactive visualizations Machine Learning with SciKit Learn, including: Linear Regression K Nearest Neighbors K Means Clustering Decision Trees Random Forests Natural Language Processing Neural Nets and Deep Learning Support Vector Machines

item.title: Salary Predictions
item.description: github url Salary Prediction Objective: Can we predict the right salary for the given job Table of contents Define Problem Can we predict the right salary for the job description? Goals Discover Data Exploratory Data Analysis(EDA) Data Visualization Develop solutions Establish a baseline Machine Learning Models Hyperparameter Tuning & Optimization Best model Deploy solution Automate the pipeline Save the predictions Defining The Problem Can we predict the right salary for the job description?

item.title: Coursera Machine Learning
item.description: certificate What is this course? This course has provided me a broad introduction to machine learning datamining statistical pattern recognition. Topics include: (i) Supervised learning (parametric/non-parametric algorithms, support vector machines, kernels, neural networks). (ii) Unsupervised learning (clustering, dimensionality reduction, recommender systems, deep learning). (iii) Best practices in machine learning (bias/variance theory; innovation process in machine learning and AI).

item.title: Contact
item.description: This is an example of a custom shortcode that you can put right into your content. You will need to add a form action to the the shortcode to make it work. Check out Formspree for a simple, free form service.
